SELECT X.DOC_NO , X.USER_CODE , PU.USER_NAME , X.DOC_TYPE , X.DOC_STATUS , X.REQUEST_YMD , X.SIGN_YMD FROM ( SELECT CMP_CODE , DOC_NO , USER_CODE , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD A WHERE PARENT_CODE='DOC001' AND CHILD_CODE=DOC_TYPE) DOC_TYPE , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD A WHERE PARENT_CODE='DOC002' AND CHILD_CODE=DOC_STATUS) DOC_STATUS , DATE_FORMAT(REQUEST_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d') REQUEST_YMD , DATE_FORMAT(SIGN_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d') SIGN_YMD FROM PM_DOCUMENT WHERE CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND USER_CODE = #{userCode} UNION ALL SELECT PS.CMP_CODE , PS.DOC_NO , PD.USER_CODE , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD A WHERE PARENT_CODE='DOC001' AND CHILD_CODE=PD.DOC_TYPE) DOC_TYPE , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD A WHERE PARENT_CODE='DOC002' AND CHILD_CODE=PD.DOC_STATUS) DOC_STATUS , DATE_FORMAT(PD.REQUEST_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d') REQUEST_YMD , DATE_FORMAT(PS.SIGN_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d') SIGN_YMD FROM PM_DOCUMENT_SIGN PS INNER JOIN PM_DOCUMENT PD ON PS.CMP_CODE = PD.CMP_CODE AND PS.DOC_NO = PD.DOC_NO WHERE PS.CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND PS.SIGN_USER = #{userCode} ) X LEFT OUTER JOIN PM_USER PU ON X.CMP_CODE = PU.CMP_CODE AND X.USER_CODE = PU.USER_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND X.DOC_STATUS = #{docStatus}
AND DATE_FORMAT(X.REQUEST_YMD,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{startDay},'-','') AND REPLACE(#{endDay},'-','')
AND DATE_FORMAT(X.SIGN_YMD,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{startDay},'-','') AND REPLACE(#{endDay},'-','')
ORDER BY X.DOC_NO DESC

SELECT A.USER_CODE , A.USER_NAME , B.CREATE_DAY , B.USE_DAY , B.REMAIN_DAY FROM PM_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN PM_USER_LEAVE B ON A.CMP_CODE = B.CMP_CODE AND A.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE WHERE A.CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND A.USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND B.CREATE_YM = (SELECT MAX(CREATE_YM) FROM PM_USER_LEAVE A WHERE CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND USER_CODE = #{userCode})
SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'),3), LPAD(CONVERT(IFNULL(MAX(DOC_NO),0)+1, CHAR),'4','0') ) AS DOC_NO FROM PM_DOCUMENT WHERE SUBSTR(DOC_NO,1,6) = SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'),3)
SELECT CONCAT(YYYY,MMDD) AS YYYYMMDD FROM shxdb.CALENDAR_HOLIDAY WHERE YYYY = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y')

SELECT PSU.USER_CODE , PU.USER_NAME , IF(IFNULL(PD.DEPT_MANAGER,'N') = 'N', false, true) MANAGER -- 부서장 , PU.JOB_POS , (SELECT CHILD_NAME FROM CODE_CHILD WHERE PARENT_CODE=PC.POS_CATEGORY AND CHILD_CODE=PU.JOB_POS) JOB_NAME -- 직책 FROM PM_SIGN_USER PSU INNER JOIN PM_USER PU ON PSU.CMP_CODE = PU.CMP_CODE AND PSU.USER_CODE = PU.USER_CODE INNER JOIN PM_COMPANY PC ON PSU.CMP_CODE = PC.CMP_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PM_DEPT PD ON PU.CMP_CODE = PD.CMP_CODE AND PU.USER_CODE = PD.DEPT_MANAGER AND PU.DEPT_CODE = PD.DEPT_CODE WHERE PSU.CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND PSU.DOC_TYPE = #{docType} AND PSU.DEPT_CODE = (SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM PM_USER PU WHERE CMP_CODE = #{cmpCode} AND USER_CODE = #{userCode}) ORDER BY IF(MANAGER = true, 1, 0), PU.JOB_POS DESC
